entries.name: completedQuest
entries.text: Thanks again for your help. Hopefully Red puts the clock back into place soon.

entries.name: foundIt1
entries.text: Have you found our clock yet?

children.name: anyClues
children.text: Umm... You wouldn't happen to have any clues, would you?

children.name: clue1
children.response: Let me start by saying: I'm so glad you asked. I've been hanging out here by the Clock Place ever since it was stolen last Saturday night. I saw everything. I can't figure out why no one's asked me anything yet. But that's pretty much how it is with me. I was born and raised in the village but people don't seem to notice me. Until that time I burned down the bridge. But it wasn't my fault! No one taught me about fireworks!

children.name: doGoOn
children.text: Please, tell me more about this fireworks incident
children.response: Well, you see, it was last fall, during the harvest celebration. Usually the village elders are in charge of such things, but I found Gandalf's stash and grabbed the big one. I lit it off and it flew up, up in the air and exploded into a million points of light. Then it turned into a dragon. Then it swooped down on the bridge over there, and the whole thing went up in flames.

children.name: storyResponse1
children.response: I know, right? Anyway, they stole the clock, rang the bell behind you, then ran off.

children.name: whichWay1
children.response: Head west, just to your left here, towards West Bridge. Cross, then head to the south shore. I think they went to Upton's Castle.

children.name: storyResponse2
children.response: Way! Anyway, they stole the clock, rang the bell behind you, then ran off.

children.name: whichWay2
children.response: Head west, just to your left here, towards West Bridge. Cross, then head to the south shore. I think they went to Upton's Castle.

children.name: storyResponse3
children.text: Great, now about that stolen clock?
children.response: Oh yeah. Well, the theives stole it, rang that bell there, and then crossed the bridge.

children.name: whichWay3
children.response: Head west, just to your left here, towards West Bridge. Cross, then head to the south shore. I think they went to Upton's Castle.

children.name: greatStory
children.text: That's a great story, but how about those clues?
children.response: Oh yeah! Sorry. Well, the night the clock was stolen, I was here. A band of theives grabbed it. Then they rang that bell. And after that they crossed the bridge over there and then ran.

children.name: whichWay4
children.response: Head west, just to your left here, towards West Bridge. Cross, then head to the south shore. I think they went to Upton's Castle.

children.name: onMyWayBack
children.text: Yes! I have it right here!
children.response: Awesome. You probably already know this, but head back to Redd for your reward.

entries.name: notStarted
entries.text: Howdy, stranger. If you're looking for work, I'd go find Redd down by West Bridge.

entries.name: foundIt2
entries.text: Have you found our clock yet?

children.name: notStolen
children.text: I have, but the clock wasn't stolen, was it?

children.name: iMean
children.text: I mean that I talked to the Man in Black and he says you gave it to him. He didn't steal anything.

children.name: fessUp
children.response: Okay, fine. I gave it to him. He was down here, shopping for stuff for his ComicCon trip. I was cleaning the clock and he saw it and said it would go perfect with his costume. So I let him have it.

children.name: fessUp2
children.response: Basically. After that, I felt like I'd made a mistake. So I rang the bell and made up the story about him stealing it.

children.name: backToRed2
children.text: I'm taking this back to Redd. I have to tell him.
